Posts.EditableText: Hey, just trying out the tutorial here (The one with the lounge), and I'm on the step called Using Scripts. I have gotten to the part where it says, If object is switched on, object, tv. The next step uses [b:2odwmecs]Then[/b:2odwmecs], something that is not showing up on my computer. I don't know if this is because I am using the web browser edition, or because I am on mac. Does anybody know why it is not appearing? I would be really grateful if you could help me out. Thanks for your time!
Posts.HTML: Hey, just trying out the tutorial here (The one with the lounge), and I'm on the step called Using Scripts. I have gotten to the part where it says, If object is switched on, object, tv. The next step uses Then, something that is not showing up on my computer. I don't know if this is because I am using the web browser edition, or because I am on mac. Posts.EditableText: 'Then' appears to be missing in the web-based version. It should be below the IF. It is there in the desktop version. See screen shots below. [attachment=1:2q1gylag]Web_version.jpg[/attachment:2q1gylag] [attachment=0:2q1gylag]Dtop_version.jpg[/attachment:2q1gylag] Not sure if this should be reported as a bug. For me, it is intuitive that the 'THEN' is understood to be there.
Posts.HTML:
'Then' appears to be missing in the web-based version. It should be below the IF. It is there in the desktop version. See screen shots below.



Not sure if this should be reported as a bug. For me, it is intuitive that the 'THEN' is understood to be there.

Posts.EditableText: Without the 'THEN' you can't collapse the script commands there so it should be reported
